thread.title: Hamilton tops practice, qualifying postponed US Grand Prix
thread.title_full: Hamilton tops practice, qualifying postponed US Grand Prix

title: Hamilton tops practice, qualifying postponed US Grand Prix
text: Hamilton tops practice, qualifying postponed US Grand Prix Saturday, 24 October 2015 (4 minutes ago) Lewis Hamilton slipped and skidded around the Circuit of the Americas, then retreated to the Mercedes garage. Recent related news AUSTIN - Lewis Hamilton demonstrated his stunning talents in ultra-wet conditions to top the times in Saturday's hastily-organised final free practice session... Bangkok Post 5 hours ago - World Also reported by • ABCNews.com Championship leader Lewis Hamilton set the pace at a rain-lashed Austin after final practice for the United States Grand Prix went ahead as scheduled. MailOnline 5 hours ago - Sports Also reported by • ABCNews.com AUSTIN - Continuing heavy rain on Saturday caused the postponement of final free practice and may result in the postponement of qualifying for this weekend’s... Bangkok Post 7 hours ago - World Also reported by • guardian.co.uk • Mid-Day • Hurricane Patricia upstages Lewis Hamilton’s tilt at third world title • First time a practice session has been completely lost since 2004 Torrential... guardian.co.uk 1 day ago - Sports You Might Like
